testsuite.name: kafka.security.auth.ZkAuthorizationTest
testsuite.system-out: Warning: The following secure root paths do not exist in ZooKeeper: /admin,/brokers,/cluster,/config,/controller,/controller_epoch,/isr_change_notification,/latest_producer_id_block,/log_dir_event_notification,/delegation_token,/kafka-acl-extended,/kafka-acl,/kafka-acl-changes,/kafka-acl-extended/prefixed,/kafka-acl-extended-changes That might be due to an incorrect chroot is specified when executing the command.
